page.title: 11The Arts in N.W.Edinburgh
page.content: {Edinburgh District Council}is helping {the arts in the communities.}The {Travelling Art Gallery,}a big painted van, visits different areas. Art groups can show their own paintings at {Blackhall Library.}The community artist helps local people to paint murals on outside walls. Every community has its own annual gala day. One big event each year is the{Pilton {Festival}of Music, Art and Drama, now in its 30th year. This year,{Arts in {Pilton}is using local people to put on an outdoor theatre production of {"Shipbuilder"}at{Granton.}It will have music, dancing, puppets and fireworks. Church groups give plays and concerts to raise money for charity. The Youth Fellowship at{Davidson's Mains Parish {Church}raised Â£1000 for the starving people of{Ethiopia}by putting on {"Jesus Christ-Superstar".
